thread.title: Stars head to Houston to watch the Super Bowl
thread.title_full: Stars head to Houston to watch the Super Bowl

title: Stars head to Houston to watch the Super Bowl
text: Share 30 shares Lady Gaga, who is performing Sunday night's half-time show, also posed for a few pre-game snaps on the field. Singer Harry Connick Jr was also spotted at NRG Stadium before the start of Sunday's game. Rooting for Atlanta! Usher was all smiles as he posed on the field just moments before kickoff. He was born in Dallas but his family later moved to Atlanta Singer Harry Connick Jr also traveled to Houston for the Super Bowl and was seen on the field at NRG Stadium not long before the beginning of Sunday's game Connick Jr and Usher seemed to chat as both of them made an appearance at NRG Stadium, ready to enjoy the Patriots vs Falcons standoff Owner, president, and general manager of the Dallas Cowboys Jerry Jones (left) talked to Connick Jr prior to the beginning of Super Bowl 51 Lady Gaga, who is performing Sunday night's half-time show, also posed for a few pre-game snaps on the field on Sunday afternoon She's got skills! The star threw the ball high over the field as she posed for a few pictures ahead of the game - and of her half-time performance All star arms! The Poker Face singer didn't let her heels stop her from throwing a mean spiral Everyone wants to meet Gaga! The field was packed with people keen to see the star Kim Kardashian didn't make it to Houston but her family seemed ready to enjoy the game in Brentwood, New York, with her daughter North in a Super-Bowl-themed outfit Dressed for comfort: Kim's black trousers had the benefit of a flexible waistband - making them the perfect choice for the food-fueled afternoon Dad's the word! Kanye West carried one-year-old Saint, who wore a mini velour tracksuit More celebrities made it to Houston for pre-game events earlier in the weekend. Teigen and her husband posed together as they arrived to enjoy Swift's concert. Legend also took a couple of pictures next to Biles and her fellow gymnast Aly Raisman. Milano and Grenier meanwhile were spotted at the Rolling Stone Live: Houston event the night before Super Bowl Sunday. Kim Kardashian didn't make it to Houston but her family seemed ready to enjoy the game in Brentwood, New York. She was seen carrying her daughter North, who was all smiles and wore a Super-Bowl-themed outfit. Other stars, such as Emily Ratajskowski, shared snaps of their pre-game preparations on social media. The actress and model posted a throwback picture of herself at last year's Super Bowl ahead of Sunday's game. Shake it out: Taylor Swift wowed as she took to the stage at DirectTV Super Saturday Night Concert pre-Super Bowl party in Houston, Texas All the hits: Taylor was no one song wonder, going from strumming her guitar during one of her ballads to hitting high notes No holding back: At one stage, the songstress flung herself to the ground finished one of her songs on her knees Swift even shocked her fans when she announced Saturday evening's pre-Super Bowl show would be her only one in 2017 'Brady's little ladies!' Vivian cheers for dad Tom before Gisele Bundchen kills time at the space centre as the stars enjoy Super Bowl Sunday Space case! The tall drink of water played around in a life-size recreation of a real spaceship Stand by! The model was happy to distract herself before husband Tom's big game Lots of little ladies! On Instagram the Brazilian beauty showed off a group of friends who also sported the 'Brady's Little Ladies' jerseys Big fan! Emily Ratajkowski looked slinky in a creme top and relaxed jeans as she shared a throwback pic from last year's Super Bowl 50 Game time for Emily: The model looked glam as she made her way to Super Bowl 51 Playing around: Scott Disick showed off his skills in an Instagram pic where the reality star is passing around a toy football Go long! The reality star was a little full of himself in the next pic, captioning the shot 'Threw it like a quarter back and he caught that like rice' while playing catch with his pal David Einhorn First time for everything! The former pageant talent made her first visit to Houston for this year's Super Bowl game Happy in Houston: Olivia Culpa and her Patriot boyfriend Danny Amendola cuddled up for the camera in this Instagram shot Share or comment on this article 30
